author: The Film Theorists
description:
Thank you Klook for sponsoring today’s video! Try out Klook today and use our promo code “FILMTHEORY” for 10% off! ► https://www.klook.com/ 

*🗣️HELLO INTERNET!🗣️Theorywear is BACK! ✨* Shop Now ► https://www.theoryverse.store/discount/LEE10OFF 

Gravity Falls premiered back in 2012 and the franchise is STILL popular to this day. And with the Limited Collector’s Edition of the Book of Bill releasing soon, it’s got me wondering…WHY is this show still relevant today? How has the fanbase continued to stay strong and get even bigger? Well, I think I have it all figured out…
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐

Sound Designer: Yosi Berman, Alena Lecorchick

title: Film Theory: Why Do You Still Care About Gravity Falls?
